class Lucky():
    hashed={0:0, 1:8, 2:16 ,3:24 ,4:4, 5:12 ,6:20}
    test_cases=int(raw_input())
    arr=[]
    for j in range(test_cases):
        inp=int(raw_input())          
        n=(inp%7)
        if(inp==1 or inp==2 or inp==9 or inp==3 or inp==10 or inp==17 or inp==5 or inp==6 or inp==13):
            arr.append(-1)
        else:
            arr.append(inp-hashed[n])  
    for k in arr:
        print k
